verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rideth <S%H7392><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> a swift <S%H7031><s%> cloud, <S%H5645><s%> and shall come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and the idols <S%H457><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be moved <S%H5128><s%> at his presence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall melt <S%H4549><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of it.

And I will set <S%H5526><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> against the Egyptians: <S%H4714><s%> and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> against his brother, <S%H251><s%> and every one <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> against city, <S%H5892><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> against kingdom. <S%H4467><s%>

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall fail <S%H1238><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof; and I will destroy <S%H1104><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> thereof: and they shall seek <S%H1875><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the idols, <S%H457><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the charmers, <S%H328><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> them that have familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the wizards. <S%H3049><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will I give over <S%H5534><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a cruel <S%H7186><s%> lord; <S%H113><s%> and a fierce <S%H5794><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over them, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H113><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall fail <S%H5405><s%> from the sea, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3220><s%> and the river <S%H5104><s%> shall be wasted <S%H2717><s%> and dried up. <S%H3001><s%>

And they shall turn the rivers far away; <S%H2186><s%> <S%H5104><s%> and the brooks <S%H2975><s%> of defense <S%H4692><s%> shall be emptied <S%H1809><s%> and dried up: <S%H2717><s%> the reeds <S%H7070><s%> and flags <S%H5488><s%> shall wither. <S%H7060><s%>

The paper reeds <S%H6169><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the brooks, <S%H2975><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the brooks, <S%H2975><s%> and every thing <S%H3605><s%> sown <S%H4218><s%> by the brooks, <S%H2975><s%> shall wither, <S%H3001><s%> be driven away, <S%H5086><s%> and be no <S%H369><s%> more.

The fishers <S%H1771><s%> also shall mourn, <S%H578><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> they that cast <S%H7993><s%> angle <S%H2443><s%> into the brooks <S%H2975><s%> shall lament, <S%H56><s%> and they that spread <S%H6566><s%> nets <S%H4365><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall languish. <S%H535><s%>
Moreover they that work <S%H5647><s%> in fine <S%H8305><s%> flax, <S%H6593><s%> and they that weave <S%H707><s%> networks, <S%H2355><s%> shall be confounded. <S%H954><s%>

And they shall be <S%H1961><s%> broken <S%H1792><s%> in the purposes <S%H8356><s%> thereof, all <S%H3605><s%> that make <S%H6213><s%> sluices <S%H7938><s%> and ponds <S%H98><s%> for fish. <S%H5315><s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are fools, <S%H191><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> counselors <S%H3289><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> is become brutish: <S%H1197><s%> how <S%H349><s%> say <S%H559><s%> ye unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the son <S%H1121><s%> of the wise, <S%H2450><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of ancient <S%H6924><s%> kings? <S%H4428><s%>

Where <S%H335><s%> are they? where <S%H645><s%> are thy wise <S%H2450><s%> men? and let them tell <S%H5046><s%> thee now, <S%H4994><s%> and let them know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath purposed <S%H3289><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are become fools, <S%H2973><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Noph <S%H5297><s%> are deceived; <S%H5377><s%> they have also seduced <S%H8582><s%> <S%H853><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even they that are the stay <S%H6438><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> thereof.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath mingled <S%H4537><s%> a perverse <S%H5773><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof: and they have caused <S%H853><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to err <S%H8582><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> thereof, as a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man staggereth <S%H8582><s%> in his vomit. <S%H6892><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> any work <S%H4639><s%> for Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> or tail, <S%H2180><s%> branch <S%H3712><s%> or rush, <S%H100><s%> may do. <S%H6213><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall Egypt <S%H4714><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> like unto women: <S%H802><s%> and it shall be afraid <S%H2729><s%> and fear <S%H6342><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the shaking <S%H8573><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shaketh <S%H5130><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> it.

And the land <S%H127><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a terror <S%H2283><s%> unto Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> maketh mention <S%H2142><s%> thereof shall be afraid <S%H6342><s%> in <S%H413><s%> himself, because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> hath determined <S%H3289><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall <S%H1961><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and swear <S%H7650><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> one <S%H259><s%> shall be called, <S%H559><s%> The city <S%H5892><s%> of destruction. <S%H2041><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and a pillar <S%H4676><s%> at <S%H681><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it shall be <S%H1961><s%> for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a witness <S%H5707><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they shall cry <S%H6817><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the oppressors, <S%H3905><s%> and he shall send <S%H7971><s%> them a savior, <S%H3467><s%> and a great one, <S%H7227><s%> and he shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and shall do <S%H5647><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and oblation; <S%H4503><s%> yea, they shall vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and perform <S%H7999><s%> it.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5062><s%> <S%H853><s%> Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> he shall smite <S%H5062><s%> and heal <S%H7495><s%> it: and they shall return <S%H7725><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and he shall be entreated <S%H6279><s%> of them, and shall heal <S%H7495><s%> them.

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> a highway <S%H4546><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> into Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the Assyrians. <S%H804><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall Israel <S%H3478><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> with Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and with Assyria, <S%H804><s%> even a blessing <S%H1293><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%>

Whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> shall bless, <S%H1288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Egypt <S%H4714><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and Assyria <S%H804><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands, <S%H3027><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> mine inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
